Portal is a puzzle game straight out of the orange box from 2007. Not much to say, but is a fun and easy game to speedrun

A true surprise and a definite classic.

Portal is an excellent game! I would definitely recommend this to anyone that loves puzzle games! If you're on the ball with problem solving this game can be beaten in 1 1/2 to 2 hours. The game originally came on "The Orange Box" so it is expected to be short because it is one of three games on the disc. GLaDOS (antagonist) provides hilarity in the game as we play through the seemingly never-ending test rooms. The game is led entirely by the silent protagonist, Chell. Don't forget about GLaDOS' promise of cake when you complete all of the puzzles! If that isn't worth it, what is?
Play this game now. - GLaDOS

помниш я спрашивал тебя у тебя портл есть дак вот он 1 часть и 2 часть игра прикольная и интересная на ум интелект можно в двоём играть такшто скачай и будем в двоём играть я 1 часть прошол прохожу 2 часть ну если что то скачивай ок ок

Again, if you haven't played this game you do not know what you are missing. Yes, it's simple, yes it's old but it's one of the most unique games I've played and if you haven't heard GLaDOS' banter or faced the infamous polite turrets or gotten the vertigo from blasting few portals then at the very least download the demo and give it a try or get the game on sale. It's worth whatever price it's at.
Short but sweet buy it. play it. love it.

One of the best games of all time
Portal is THE BEST game i have ever in my life played. The concept is amazing and the storyline is crazy. Hope you enjoy it. :)

+ The game mechanics are one of the most innovative I have seen in a long time.
+ The design is awesome
+ GLaDOS, the computer that guides you through the test chambers.
+ There is no much plot, but it is really fun, and one can see a larger background behind it.
+ One of these games that are really (and I mean *really*) worth playing.

FPS視点パズルゲー。主人公は実験のためにスピーカーから聞こえる声に従い、テストをこなして行く。
シングルプレイのみで、リプレイ性は低い。Valve特有の静けさと、左右上下が頻繁に変わる特殊なパズルは酔いやすい。SourceEngineの独特な“軽さ”も気になる。
若干のゴリ押しが可能となっているため難易度は低く、内容もやや物足りないものを感じる。しかし、ストーリーや独自性といったものは一流のものなので、他のゲームにはないものをプレイしたいというユーザーには良いゲームだろう。
事前知識がなくても全く問題はないが、より深く知りたい場合はHalf-Life“2”くらいはプレイしておいた方がいいかもしれない。
Totally recomend it, bad side, its very short, not much after the story, I suggest getting the second, theres not much story to miss in this one
Очень интересная игра.
Puzzles en primera persona con portales y con una ambientación y un trasfondo brutales, pequeño juego que marcaría un antes y un despues.
amazing 3D puzzle game

A great classic! I recommend everybody play this BEFORE playing Portal 2, just to get a nice little backstory.
Quite short, but it's a really good puzzle game and the dialogues are really funny.

Portal is a study in minimalistic storytelling. No cutscenes, no exposition, just gameplay, environment, and GLaDOS. The innovative puzzley gameplay is pretty cool and engaging, but make sure you play it all the way through, because the ending is excellent. Don't worry, it's not very long.

This is critically acclaimed for a reason. I fully endorse it. Give it a look when you get the chance.
Portal is a fun, addicting games with tons of levels and hours upon hours of challenging and awesome gameplay!
Прошел основные уровни на одном дыхании. Эта игра отлично подходит что бы напрячь мозги, сконцентрировать внимание и размять пальца.

A game that makes the impossible, possible, thanks to the portal gun. In this game, you use the portal gun to create portals you can go through. The game puts you in Apeture Science, a research facility that has test subjects test the dea... uh, I mean perfectly safe inventions. The game has some basic puzzels at first, but then you get the portal gun. When you get it, the game starts to become harder, until you reach the end... or is it? This is a great puzzel game that will make you think with portals.
Großartiges Spiel!
Portal est un très bon jeu avec un concept assez sympathique qui sera beaucoup plus élaboré dans sa suite. Petit bémol sur la durée de vie qui n'est pas très longue.

Simply one of the best games I've ever experienced. Not only is it fun to play, it stretches your brain with challenging puzzles, innovative tools, and witty banter. If you're ever looking for a new gaming experience, choose Portal.

What about this game? It can be considerated the "Tutorial Mode" of Portal 2. The Concept and the gameplays are the same in both game but in Portal (the first) there isn't a real story line and there aren't a lot of playable levels. I recommend this game for the concept but not for the (short) playability. Anyway both games are awesome but i sincerely prefer Portal 2.
Mind bending, fun adventure through Aperture, the main "Villain" is great and the sequal is better! POTaTOS :3

The game is well made! Super entertaining to play and solve the puzzles! 

The characters are forming very well already in the first Portal game. 
If you as much as think about playing the second game before the first - forget about it! You will gain much more positive experience from playing the first one first :D 

Enjoy the cake!
On Linux!

Anyone who hasn't played Portal (do such people really exist? On Steam, I mean) should definitely take steps to change that. Combine the puzzle-type environment of the old Myst games with the fully 3D environment and controls of modern FPS games, remove the urgency of aiming and maneuvering that alienates some people from FPS games, and add in a good dose of plotline with a healthy sarcastic comedy undertone, and you have an idea of what you should not be missing out on by not playing Portal.
I'm Tsurugi Masamune and I approve this message.
Worth playing. The puzzles are fun and challenging to do.
O melhor fnal de um jogo na história!

Um jogo que simplesmente mudou minha vida. O humor, os puzzles, a história....TUDO!

Legendary game! Must play!
so fun...
緊張と緩和

Portal takes a neat concept of creating portals between two locations and goes on to make a whole game out of it. You have to solve a variety of puzzles using just your wits and your portals - this game may be based on the game engine of a first person shooter (Hlf-Life), but it definitely falls into the puzzle genre. 

There is no soundtrack and the strictly minimalist setting has little in the way of eye candy. As for the storyline, your silent protagonist interacts with only one other character, an insane computer that also serves as the game's antagonist. The computer sometimes has witty remarks that keep the game from getting stale, but don't expect to be wowed by the plot, or the rather underwhelming ending. 

I enjoyed the first half of the game and felt the difficulty level was about right. However, after a certain event midway through the game the difficulty level ramps up significantly, and although there is no penalty for dying I will say my frustration level increased dramatically in the second half of the game. I was actually relieved when I unexpededly stumbled upon the final boss because it meant my tedious plodding through the second half of the game was finally at an end.

If you like puzzle games get this if it's $5 or less.

The Apeture Sciences Board of Directors would like to remind you that your contributions to the scientific community made by buying and playing this game will far outweigh the possible risks, including but not limited to excrutiating pain, exsaperation, and possible death.
Экшен - головоломка с запоминающимся главным злодеем (т.е., извините, злодейкой), толковым юмором и довольно самобытной атмосферой. Настоящий праздник, оставляющий только положительные эмоции.

Друзья! наконец-то эта игра вышла для Линукса, пусть и Бета!
Рекомендую! одна из самых классных игр! и теперь для всех Платформ. Работает шустро.
Следующим проверю L4D для линукс, говорят там новая система мутаций.
Badass storyline. Makes you feel stuff.

Portal is all that needs to be said.
Go buy it.

Portal is definitely my favorite puzzle game a surprise as I don’t play very many puzzle games due to being a complete dumbass. Still though the game isn’t just a simple puzzle game but, has a story to it and in general is just entertaining and fun gameplay. A short and sweet campaign, various challenge maps that are actually challenging lol, and the ability to download custom made maps from the community.

+Short
+Cheap and probably less than $3 on sale
+Entertaining short and sweet campaign that imo wasn’t that challenging aka I didn’t have to look up majority of the levels in order to progress and i’m dumb
+You can quick save mid levels and quick load which is incredibly helpful
+Funny dialogue
+Boss fight
+More than just a puzzle game
+Several challenge maps that are actually difficult 
+This game has a lot of assets from Half-Life 2 which you can spawn with console commands which can be pretty funny as you can also play through the entire Half-Life 2 campaign as well if you do some additional steps
+Cheats
+Level select
+Level editor and ability to download others maps. Note that this game is pretty old so you have to download the maps elsewhere

-I didn’t get any cake
-No full controller support not a big deal but, would’ve been nice
-This game states that it has remote play, however, it does not. There are no co-op and or online multiplayer features to this game whatsoever therefore remote play obviously won’t work. Various Valve games for no reason have a remote play feature said to be in the game yet like I said this game has no local co-op features whatsoever.

Honestly can’t even think of any cons for this game, it's just that perfect. It’s so simple but amazing in the same sense. Definitely worth trying if you haven’t already you’re missing out. I don’t feel like this game is that hard, which is great because incredibly difficult puzzle games are just zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz. Just buy this shit already
fun

I bought this game because it was on sale and i am really glad i bought it. The characters are amazing, and the puzzles make you think twice. This game has everything you ever want in a game

Очень интересная и ни на что не похожая игра. Только представьте: вы впервые в жизни узнаёте, что такое порталы и как ими пользоваться. К сожалению, сюжета в первой части как такового нет. Точнее, он есть, но он слишком скучен. Зато головоломки и дополнительные карты очень интересны! Игра включает в себя 19 тестовых камер + 12 дополнительных камер (усложнённые камеры) + Побег + Финальная битва. Советую всем поиграть, очень интересно. Хотя, по сравнению со второй частью, эта просто повязнет где-нибудь в грязи. Если очень хотите поиграть, дождитесь скидки. На эту игру они довольно часто бывают. А в целом - игра очень хорошая и увлекательная. Пусть иногда и достаёт иногда сложностью, всё равно играть приятно!
Impresionante nueva mecánica de juego. Todo un desafío para la lógica clásica de los videojuegos. DEBES jugarlo, y después su secuela Portal2.
ce jeu est super addictif et super bien réaliser, à recommander à tout vos proches

Great atmosphere and a storytelling that gives you next to no explanations unless you look for them. Ingenious concept. Do note that Portal 2 has better graphics, but this game is of such quality that you'll forget that it's a few years old.

Sehr unterhaltsames Rätselspiel.
Allerdings vermittelte mir die Ego-Perspektive und die fortlaufende Reise des Charakters durch immer neue Rätselumgebungen zusammen mit der Laborcomputer-"Unterstützung" eine sehr depressive Stimmung. Entgegen meiner Gewohnheit habe ich irgendwann Begleitmusik angeschaltet, um das zu minimieren.

Portal is the first game in the portal saga and overall an ok start to this saga. Portal is about solving room puzzles with portal (heck that's the name) with bizaare obsticals that are in your path as you try to progress through this puzzle solver. For myself I beat the game in a grand total of an hour and forty minutes which isn't long cause  i was expecting this game to be long but its not. Score:7/10
